Plotting

sphot.plotting.astroplot(data, percentiles=[1, 99.9], cmap='viridis', ax=None, offset=0, norm=None, figsize=(5, 5), title=None, set_bad='r')

plot 2d data in the log scale. Automatically takes care of the negative values.

sphot.plotting.plot_profile2d(data, ax=None, fig=None, lower_limit_percentile=20, left=False, **kwargs)
sphot.plotting.plot_sersicfit_result(data, data_annulus, _img)

Plot the sersic profile fit result.

Parameters:

  • data (2d array) -- the original data

  • _img (2d array) -- the fitted model image

Returns:

None

sphot.plotting.plot_sphot_results(cutoutdata)
